multiplayer.description: Battle up to three other players in a deathmatch-style melee. The first player to 6 kills wins!

multiplayer.description: Race up to 9 other players down to the lunar surface. There are less landing pads than players - do you choose the easy close pad with everyone else, or risk your fuel and go for the remote pad with a more difficult landing and no competition? At the end of each race, the remaining competitors move on, until only one is left.

touch.description: Tap and drag the 'thrust slider' on the left to adjust lander thrust.

desktop.description: Use the 'w' or 's' keys to increase or decrease lander thrust.

desktop.description: Use the 'a' or 'd' key to rotate your lander.

touch.description: Press the 'emergency' button on the right to to automatically rotate and thrust your ship out of harms way.

desktop.description: Press the 'spacebar' key to to automatically rotate and thrust your ship out of harms way.

multiplayer.description: Polish your skill at Missile Command, using combos to level up your weapons of mass destruction. The better you do, the more damage you can cause to your opponent. Fire off a challenging multi-hit warhead, discharge a gun-jamming stunner, or wait until you can end the game with a nuke.
